title:
Who or what trains future Wilmington police officers? And, on a much broader scale, who or what determines how and by whom police are trained across the U.S.?



I ask because of the large number of instances both small and large city police departments have (allegedly, of course), assume indifference and a lack of reasonable response, in certain instances, against those they are supposed to serve and protect. Are there state or federal guidelines/rules used to train cadets?



Thank you.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/03/who-or-what-trains-future-wilmington-police-officers/
